Personal data collection:

After registering to the SmartShare, you can offer and request rides. Your personal information is stored by Ben-Gurion University of the Negev and used by the partners of the SmartSociety EU project consortium for academic purposes only. By accepting this privacy policy, you may add, review or delete personal data to/from your profile. SmartShare may analyse your behaviour and infer data to be linked to your profile information. Both forms of personal data collection are entirely voluntary and will only happen with your explicit informed consent.

Data Controller:

Your personal profile will be stored and processed by Ben-Gurion University of the Negev (Ben-Gurion University of the Negev P.O.B. 653 Beer-Sheva 8410501 Israel) within the scope of the SmartSociety EU project.

Purposes:
By accepting to use SmartShare, you allow Ben-Gurion University of the Negev to process your profile for the following purposes:
* provide a personalized service
* matching your profile with other profiles
* performing statistical analysis

User Rights:
You can access, update, amend and delete your personal information that is stored by SmartShare at any time at your user profile information page. You can also define and configure your privacy settings by accessing your profile information.

Does SmartShare share my personal information?
Your personal information is going to be accessible by other SmartSociety consortium members that may process your personal data. Additional personal data that may be inferred from your personal data is going to be stored by Ben-Gurion University of the Negev. A minimum set of your personal profile may be publicly displayed to other users of SmartShare. This includes your username and geographical information concerning start and end points of your ride. Additional profile information, such as preferences, may be shared with SmartShare users if you explicitly agree to it.

Data Retention:
Your personal data will be stored until you request deletion or until the SmartSociety project ends its activities.


Will this privacy policy change?
No. Never.
